data.title: Bringing textbooks to life in AR
data.description: The world’s leading augmented reality platform, built specifically for publishers. Via the Ludenso Studio, editors are able to quickly, affordably, and even retrospectively implement AR enrichments directly into their textbooks.
data.content:
Ludenso | Bringing textbooks to life in AR
===============
 

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/63355284ef2ab90643546bb8_Ludenso%20logo.png)](https://www.ludenso.com/)

*   [About us](https://www.ludenso.com/about-us)
*   [Careers](https://www.ludenso.com/careers)
*   [Blog](https://www.ludenso.com/blog)
*   [Request a demo](https://www.ludenso.com/book-demo)
*   [Log in](https://studio.ludenso.com/)

Bringing textbooks to life
==========================

The world’s leading AI and AR driven authoring platform, built specifically for publishers

[Request a demo](https://www.ludenso.com/book-demo)

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/635240777f166642933fcec9_Front%20page%20image%20bg.png)

![Image 3: An image of a satelite
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d492a4b26ea8c41650e58b_Satelite%404x.png)

![Image 4: An image depicting a video
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d49b0f10388009af6944cf_Video%20enrichment_2%402x.png)

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6347ff039e50ac16d2de8f68_front%20page%20image%20heart.png)

![Image 6: An image of an ancient vase
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d480dacccc27a458f4c343_Greek%20Vase%404x.png)

![Image 7: An audio icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d5ef7ff2bd8713fd24ac81_Audio%20Icon%20wo%20shadow%404x.png)

![Image 8: An image of an atom](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d492202b478e3c54f9d195_atom%404x.png)

![Image 9: An image of perseverance, the mars rover](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d49657a5aa881ed6cb43e6_Perseverance%404x.png)

![Image 10: An image of a dinosaur
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64d480dabf066d2473f17ec5_Dinosaur%404x.png)

Slide 2 of 8.

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/63523ff87f16664a373fc873_Front%20page%20image%20foreground.png)

![Image 12: Bett award 2023 winner](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6426929d42b60f86dbc7f278_Bett%20winner.png)

**2023 Bett award winner!**

![Image 13: Bett award 2023 winner](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6426929d42b60f86dbc7f278_Bett%20winner.png)In collaboration with PG online ClearRevise in the category "Free digital content, app or open educational resource"

Trusted by publishers globally:

![Image 14: Logo for Sage publishing
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f6e150d3a129808b3_Sage.png)![Image 15: Logo for cambridge university press](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3fb37c805d16030dd7_Cambridge.png)![Image 16: Logo for plantyn publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f0801133da7769c4a_Plantyn.png)![Image 17: Logo for Aschehoug publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f6e150da4559808b4_Aschehoug.png)![Image 18: Logo for PG Online publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f16e4ef7b95835ec8_PGONLINE.png)

![Image 19: Cambridge logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3fb37c805d16030dd7_Cambridge.png)![Image 20: Logo for Krager publishing
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64c39dd6644076fa467090ce_Krager%20logo.png)![Image 21: Logo for PG Online publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f16e4ef7b95835ec8_PGONLINE.png)

![Image 22: Sage publishing logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/64143954ffbc9c0751c4e2b9_Sage%20logo.png)![Image 23: Logo for plantyn publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee3f0801133da7769c4a_Plantyn.png)

[74% of educators using AR use it at least once a week McGraw Hill, Augmented Reality in Education, 2022](https://www.mheducation.com/unitas/school/explore/mcgrawhill-ar-report-2022.pdf)[95% of students think AR should be used in class Springer, Journal of Science Education and Technology, 2023](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10956-023-10030-7)[92% of students want to use AR alongside existing learning materials Elsevier, Education for Chemical Engineers, 2022](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1749772822000069?via%3Dihub)

Sparking magical AHA moments with 3D models

Why create AR books with Ludenso?

![Image 24: Handshake icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adb09a2deca7fbbcb4fa5_Handshake.svg)

Win more adoptions

By differentiating their key titles with AR enrichment, publishers can create a more compelling offering for faculty. Ludenso clients have seen sales increases of 43% on AR enriched titles.

![Image 25: Multimedia icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adb094ca1967c7d965827_Multimedia.svg)

Maximize the value of digital assets

By facilitating a seamless learner journey from the textbook to existing digital content, publishers can bridge the gap between physical and digital content.

![Image 26: Easy icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adb098721fd69fe9ece9b_Snap.svg)

A seamless, non-technical workflow

Via Ludenso Studio, editors and authors are able to quickly, affordably, and even retrospectively implement AR enrichments directly into their textbooks.

![Image 27: Idea icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adfbae851f016daf3e445_Idea.svg)

Boost engagement and sell-through rate

Ensure student intrigue and boost publisher brand perception. By catering to all learners, publishers maximize the ROI from each adoption.

![Image 28: accessibility icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adfba0eb8803351163c5c_UU.svg)

Improve accessibility and learning outcomes

Allow complex and abstract concepts to be understood more effectively. Affordably cater to all students, by creating in-built differentiation for those with special educational needs.

![Image 29: Support icon
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adfbadebcfd411aafa92c_Support.svg)

Full dedicated support team and sales training

Comprehensive in-person training of sales reps on how to leverage AR- enriched titles to secure new adoptions and boost sales. Full Ludenso Studio training for editorial teams to minimize their time requirement in the workflow.

![Image 30: Analytics icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adfba413e4121620cc7fc_Analytics.svg)

Meaningful analytics on reader behavior

Full access to a custom analytics platform, allowing commissioning and editorial teams to take more data-driven and profitable decisions.

![Image 31: Life span icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adfba0d3a8fce621adf77_Lifespan.svg)

Improve the lifespan of key textbooks

By retrofitting existing titles with AR, publishers can protect their initial production investment while engaging key authors.

[See more benefits for publishers ![Image 32: Arrow down ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633af3ac2c701c59fa71d936_Vector%20196%20(Stroke).svg)](https://www.ludenso.com/#)[![Image 33: Arrow up ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6336b3bf0ab1d62247d2cb7b_down%20arrow.svg)](https://www.ludenso.com/#)

How does it work?

Ludenso Studio

Publishers can enrich an existing or new textbook with augmented reality in minutes. Ludenso Studio uses an intuitive drag-and-drop interface and provides access to a huge library of existing 3D models.

![Image 34: Illustration of book with augmented reality enrichments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adc4bcc30335cd49325f0_LudensoStudioIllustration.svg)

![Image 35: Illustration of augmented reality enrichments in a book seen through a phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adc4bcc303398529325f1_LudensoExploreIllustration.svg)

Ludenso Explore

Students can then immediately access the AR enrichments (including interactive 3D models, videos, audio clips and links) via the Ludenso Explore app, by just holding their phone over the print or digital book.

Ludenso Analytics

Publishers get full access to a custom real-time analytics platform, displaying granular data on student engagement within their AR-enriched titles.

![Image 36: Illustration of an analytics page for an augmented reality enriched book](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633adc4b0be93641748d9af8_LudensoAnalyticsIllustration.svg)

[Request a demo](https://www.ludenso.com/book-demo)

What do our customers say?

![Image 37: Cambridge University Press logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/633aee051f3e204a89d50da8_Cambridge.png)

"When digital learning is at its best, it provides an enrichment of learners’ experiences, better retention in memory of vital knowledge, and develops both understanding and skill in all learners. The Ludenso team has done something very special; it is digital learning at its very best."

\- Tim Oates, Group Director of the Assessment Research and Development at Cambridge University Press & Assessment

![Image 38: Logo for aschehoug publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6335529b6c3837e57f2d496e_Aschehoug.svg)

"Ludenso makes it extremely simple for our team to create AR experiences with both new and already printed textbooks. This has been invaluable for our efforts to empower more students while increasing the sales of our textbooks"

\- Bente Franck-Sætervoll, Director of Education at Aschehoug

![Image 39: Gyldendal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/65e9f8f688641010c2e6ecbe_gyldendal.png)

"_We are utilizing Ludenso for various book titles within the nurses’ educational program. Illustrations play a crucial role in these books, and now we can add medical 3D models, videos, sound files, and web links to improve student outcomes. As an editor, adding or removing AR elements is easy – even after the book is printed._"

– Martine Hareide, Editor of Academic Literature at Gyldendal

![Image 40: Logo for aschehoug publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6335529b6c3837e57f2d496e_Aschehoug.svg)

"Ludenso makes it extremely simple for our team to create AR experiences with both new and already printed textbooks. This has been invaluable for our efforts to empower more students while increasing the sales of our textbooks"

\- Bente Franck-Sætervoll, Director of Education at Aschehoug

![Image 41: Logo for aschehoug publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6335529b6c3837e57f2d496e_Aschehoug.svg)

"Ludenso makes it extremely simple for our team to create AR experiences with both new and already printed textbooks. This has been invaluable for our efforts to empower more students while increasing the sales of our textbooks"

\- Bente Franck-Sætervoll, Director of Education at Aschehoug

![Image 42: Logo for aschehoug publishing house](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6335527195a2bb0d2605ffa0/6335529b6c3837e57f2d496e_Aschehoug.svg)

"Ludenso makes it extremely simple for our team to create AR experiences with both new and already printed textbooks. This has been invaluable for our efforts to empower more students while increasing the sales of our textbooks"

\- Bente Franck-Sætervoll, Director of Education at Aschehoug
